import { Component } from "@angular/core"; @Component({ selector: "app-register", templateUrl: "./register.component.html", styleUrls: ["./register.component.scss"], }) export class RegisterComponent { //Khai báo các biến tương ứng trường dữ liệu trên form phone: string; password: string; retypePassword: string; fullName : string; address: string; isAccepted: boolean; dateOfBirth: Date; constructor() { this.phone = ""; this.password = ""; this.retypePassword = ""; this.fullName = ""; this.address = ""; this.isAccepted = false; this.dateOfBirth = new Date(); t } onPhoneChange() { console.log(`Phone typed: ${this.phone}`) } register() { const message = `phone: ${this.phone}` + `password: ${this.password}` + `retypePassword: ${this.retypePassword}` + `fullName : ${this.fullName} ` + `address : ${this.address}` + `isAccepted : ${this.isAccepted}`; alert(message); } }
